001    /*

003     */
004    
005    package org.greatage.ioc.cache;
006    
007    /**
008     * This interface represents cache that provides simplified access to all cache operations.
009     *
010     * @param <K>   type of cache keys
011     * @param <V>   type of cache items
012     * @author Ivan Khalopik
013     * @since 1.0
014     */
015    public interface Cache<K, V> {
016    
017            /**
018             * Gets cache name.
019             *
020             * @return cache name
021             */
022            String getName();
023    
024            /**
025             * Checks if this cache instance contains item with specified key.
026             *
027             * @param key item key
028             * @return true it this cache instance contains item with specified key, false otherwise
029             */
030            boolean contains(K key);
031    
032            /**
033             * Gets cached item by its key.
034             *
035             * @param key cache item key
036             * @return cached item or null if not exists
037             */
038            V get(K key);
039    
040            /**
041             * Puts item to cache.
042             *
043             * @param key   item key
044             * @param value item instance
045             */
046            void put(K key, V value);
047    
048            /**
049             * Removes cached item by its key.
050             *
051             * @param key cached item key
052             * @return removed item instance or null if not exists
053             */
054            V remove(K key);
055    
056            /**
057             * Clears cache. All cached items will be removed from it.
058             */
059            void clear();
060    }
